sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_transform_script"><sys_transform_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>false</active><map display_value="BTKR Transform">17fc16d1db0fdc50bdd3c553059619f6</map><order>150</order><script><![CDATA[(function runTransformScript(source, map, log, target /*undefined onStart*/ ) {


	var btkr = source.u_sn_references;

	log.warn("TTM 8: btkr=" + btkr);

        var buit = new GlideRecord("x_guhs_build_track_buit");
		buit.addQuery("u_sn_references", btkr);
		buit.query();	
	    while (buit.next()) {
			buit.number = target.number;
			buit.update();
		}

	

})(source, map, log, target);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_transform_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>VCheung</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-09-03 20:57:51</sys_created_on><sys_id>10a8fa99dbcfdc50bdd3c553059619db</sys_id><sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count><sys_name>onComplete</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Build Tracker" source="x_guhs_build_track">1b966fe0db479850bdd3c553059619f0</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Build Tracker">1b966fe0db479850bdd3c553059619f0</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_transform_script_10a8fa99dbcfdc50bdd3c553059619db</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>VCheung</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-09-04 12:48:35</sys_updated_on><when>onComplete</when></sys_transform_script></record_update>
